game.name: Wildseed
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wildseed is a relaxing game where you grow plants and build your garden into a haven for cute animals. Keep your animals happy and your plants healthy, find rare variants, and discover the ancient secrets your garden holds - one seed at a time.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wildseed is a relaxing game where you grow plants and build your garden into a haven for cute animals. Keep your animals happy and your plants healthy, find rare variants, and discover the ancient secrets your garden holds - one seed at a time.
